pullrequest.title: Support only standard CMAKE format for BUILD_TYPES

content.raw: Why are we setting `CMAKE_*_FLAGS` manually like this?  Those variables should be set by CMake as a result of setting the `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE`.  From the docs on `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE`: "For example, if CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE is Debug, then CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG will be added to the CMAKE_C_FLAGS".
